SEQUENCE.NARRATION: Since the destruction of the Death Cube, the Crystal Order has been busy cleaning up the debris left floating around in the vacuum of space.
In the meantime, the Source Academy is sending out recovery crews to retrieve any technology they can from the Death Cube that may help further their understanding of the Source.
Meanwhile, your friends are at the Great hall celebrating the success of their first mission.

DIALOGUE.SPEECH: Hey! There you are! We started the party without you. Here, I saved you some food!

SEQUENCE.NARRATION: You join in with your friends, exchanging tales about your encounters during the mission, trying to one-up one another, while Beat listened on with wide-eyed wonder.

POPUP.NARRATION: Quite suddenly, the holographic stage flickers to life, projecting a larger than life image of Grandmaster Hartin Menz.

DIALOGUE.SPEECH: Greetings cadets! I am sorry to interrupt your festivities, but I have an important announcement.
First of all, I would like to commend you. You have all done well to aid in the defeat of the Rogue Grandmaster. But it would seem that this fight is far from over.
Grandmaster Lok Kim and I have received grim news from our scouts.
It is as we feared - the Rogue Grandmaster is still alive.
He had managed to escape the Death Cube on an escape pod just moments before the explosion.

SEQUENCE.NARRATION: The Cadets look to each other in disbelief. The Great Hall is suddenly abuzz with fervent chattering from the Cadets tinged with fear, anger and shock.
Grandmaster Hartin held up a hand, gesturing the Cadets to settle down.

DIALOGUE.SPEECH: Disappointing as it may be, that we have failed to rid the galaxy of this menace, destroying the Death Cube and saving the inhabitants of Planet-Y was a great step forward.
We have recovered technologies and literature from the Death Cube that are of great intrigue to our Stewards.
Studying this may well serve to advance our understanding of the Source and it shall be our priority for the weeks to come.
Your task, as Cadets of the Source Academy would be to assist the Stewards in their task and glean whatever knowledge you can from these studies.
And so I shall expect to see each and everyone of you in the classroom by 1400 hours.

SEQUENCE.NARRATION: And with that, the transmission was over and the hologram of the Grandmaster faded away. The atmosphere now solemn, the cadets made their way out of the Great Hall.

DIALOGUE.SPEECH: I can’t believe the Rogue Grandmaster got away after all that! We trained so hard for it too!
Yeah. I guess he wasn’t the most powerful Sourcerer in the Crystal Order for nothing.
Maybe the advanced technology in his ship helped him somehow...
Or he may have achieved a level of understanding of the Source higher than any of us can possibly imagine...
If so, the technology that we recover from the Death Cube will be crucial to us if we are to have any hope of defeating him at all.
You’re right. Come one, let’s hurry on to the classroom. No doubt, Grandmaster Hartin has some insights to share on all the new findings.
Phew, that was intense!
Well done Cadets! You are quick to grasp the concept of streams!
It will be some years before the Rogue Grandmaster recuperates his strength to retaliate against the Academy.
You must use this time well to hone your skills in the Source.
